page.title: 14GUARDBRIDGE HOTEL
page.content: Guardbridge Hotel is a small, pleasant establishment that welcomes children and has beds for 8 people when full. It is run by a local couple who employ 2 part-time workers in the evenings. They receive approximately 150 visitors per day through their small pub which is very popular with the locals. As well as this, they do single meals for non-residents and take bookings in advance. Although they only advertise occasionally in the St Andrews Citizen, the hotel (which is visible from the main road) gets a lot of trade from passing traffic, especially in their busiest months - June to August.
